title: Playing with light
content:
I saw Fred Eerdekens work years ago, but a friend just sent me a link to his latest stuff. His work is all created with cast shadows. The script is particularly beautiful.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107205103im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Could_suggest2.jpg)

[http://users.pandora.be/eerdekens/main.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107205103/http:/users.pandora.be/eerdekens/main.htm "http://users.pandora.be/eerdekens/main.htm")

Breathe deeply, dim the lights and click on the "Shadow Play" exhibit.

Thanks Brendan for the linkage.
author: Joe Pemberton
